mapper.select: SELECT D.restaurant_name AS restaurantName, B.point AS totalAmount, SUM(OD.menu_count) AS menuCount, E.reservation_people_count AS personCount, E.reservation_time AS reservationTime, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT F.menu_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS menuNames FROM `order` C INNER JOIN restaurant D ON C.restaurant_id = D.restaurant_id LEFT JOIN order_detail OD ON C.order_id = OD.order_id LEFT JOIN reservation E ON C.order_id = E.order_id INNER JOIN user_payment_member B ON C.order_id = B.order_id INNER JOIN restaurant_menu F ON OD.menu_id = F.menu_id WHERE C.order_id = #{orderId} GROUP BY C.order_id

SELECT A.user_id AS userId , A.point , B.order_id AS orderId , B.reservation_status AS reservationStatus , C.created_at AS paymentDate , C.ticket_id AS ticketId , C.ticket_status AS ticketStatus , D.menu_id AS menuId , D.menu_count AS menuCount , D.price , E.menu_name AS menuName FROM user_payment_member A LEFT JOIN `order` B ON A.order_id = B.order_id LEFT JOIN ticket C ON A.order_id = C.order_id LEFT JOIN order_detail D ON B.order_id = D.order_id LEFT JOIN restaurant_menu E ON D.menu_id = E.menu_id WHERE A.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY A.user_id order BY C.created_at DESC
